questions.question: Nobody …………………….. there to help him.
questions.description: Nobody is followed by a singular verb.

questions.question: Nobody called, …………………………..?
questions.description: Nobody is a negative word hence, it is followed by an affirmative tag.

questions.question: Everyone of them ………………………….. arrived.
questions.description: Use a singular verb after every and everyone.

questions.question: That was ………………………….. not the right thing to do.
The thing …………………………… happened next shocked us.
questions.description: As a relative pronoun that can refer to things.

questions.question: He ………………………………. to the market. He should be here soon.
questions.description: The present perfect is used here because he is still in the market.

questions.question: The milkman has already …………………………..
questions.description: Has been is used to talk about a finished action. The milkman has already been means the milkman came and went.

questions.question: Jack London is regarded ………………………….. one of the best American novelists.
Considered ………………………….. a whole, the movie wasn’t bad.
Clever …………………………. she was, she couldn’t solve the puzzle.
questions.description: Clever as she was and clever though she was both mean 'though she was clever'.
